description:
This is an advanced Rich Text Input based on Bubble's Rich Text Input plugin

Current feature list:
1. Get the RichText value as HTML (from element's properties)
2. Insert Custom text into the Rich Text Input via Workflows
name: Advanced RichText Input
plugin_instructions:
Install the plugin and use the Advanced Richtext Input as a text input element.

Get RichText value as HTML:
- HTML value is accessible as a property of this element via Dynamic Data ('Adv RichText InputA's value_html')

Custom text/variables can be inserted at the caret position via Workflows
- New Action in a WF -> Element Actions -> Insert Text in a Adv RichText Input
- This Action takes dynamic text as an input and inserts it into the input field when the WF is run
